mapper.select: SELECT uid, upw, nm, pic, created_at as createdAt FROM t_user
select upw from t_user where uid = #{uid}

SELECT COUNT(ifeed) AS feedCnt, IFNULL(B.favCnt, 0) AS favCnt, C.nm, C.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_feed A INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.iuser, COUNT(A.ifeed) AS favCnt FROM t_favorite A JOIN t_feed B ON A.ifeed = B.ifeed AND B.iuser = #{iuser} ) B ON A.iuser = B.iuser JOIN t_user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
